public class Manager
extends User
Manager of the library
Author:
Mustafa Gurler, yesimyalc

  • Method Details

    • addBook

      public Publication addBook​(Publication addedBook)
      Adds a book to the library stock
      Parameters:
      addedBook - is the book that will be added.
      Returns:
      the added book

    • removeBook

      public Publication removeBook​(Publication removedBook)
      Removes a book from the stock of the library.
      Parameters:
      removedBook - is the book that will be removed from the stock
      Returns:
      the removed book. If the book is not in the stock, returns null.

    • addLibrarian

      public boolean addLibrarian​(Librarian newLibrarian)
      Adds a librarian to the library. If the librarian already exists does not add again.
      Parameters:
      newLibrarian - is the librarian that will be added.
      Returns:
      true if added, false if not

    • removeLibrarian

      public Librarian removeLibrarian​(Librarian oldLibrarian)
      Removes a librarian from the library. If the librarian does not exist, doesnt do anything.
      Parameters:
      oldLibrarian - is the librarian that will be removed
      Returns:
      the removed librarian, null if no one is removed

    • addJanitor

      public boolean addJanitor​(Janitor newJanitor)
      Adds a janitor to the library. If the janitor already exists does not add again.
      Parameters:
      newJanitor - is the janitor that will be added.
      Returns:
      true if added, false if not

    • removeJanitor

      public Janitor removeJanitor​(Janitor oldJanitor)
      Removes a janitor from the library. If the janitor does not exist, doesnt do anything.
      Parameters:
      oldJanitor - is the janitor that will be removed
      Returns:
      the removed janitor, null if no one is removed

    • addTasks

      public boolean addTasks​(java.lang.String janitorName, java.lang.String theTaskID)
      Adds a new task to a janitor. If the janitor does not belong to the library, does nothing.
      Parameters:
      janitorID - is the janitor's ID that will have the new task
      theTaskID - is the new task that will be added to a janitor
      Returns:
      true if added, false if not

    • acceptBookDemand

      public boolean acceptBookDemand​(Publication demandedBook)
      Accepts and removes a book from demandedBooks list in the library. Stock is also updated.
      Parameters:
      demandedBook - demanded book.
      Returns:
      false if there is nothing to accept, true if a book is accepted.

    • acceptBookDemand

      public boolean acceptBookDemand()
      Accepts and removes the last book from demandedBooks list in the library. Stock is also updated.
      Returns:
      false if there is nothing to accept, true if a book is accepted.

    • acceptAllBookDemands

      public void acceptAllBookDemands()
      Gets all the demands from the demandedBooks data field of library and adds them to the stock of the library. At the end demandedBooks data field must be empty and all the books must be added to the stock.

    • declineBookDemand

      public boolean declineBookDemand​(Publication demandedBook)
      Declines and removes a book from demandedBooks list in the library. Stock remains unchanged.
      Returns:
      false if there is nothing to decline, true if a book is declined.

    • declineBookDemand

      public boolean declineBookDemand()
      Declines and removes the last book from demandedBooks list in the library. Stock remains unchanged.
      Returns:
      false if there is nothing to decline, true if a book is declined.

    • declineAllBookDemands

      public void declineAllBookDemands()
      Gets all the demands from the demandedBooks data field of library and removes them. Does not add to the stock. At the end demandedBooks data field must be empty.

    • listPastEvents

      public void listPastEvents()
      Prints out all the past events in the library.

    • listUpcomingEvents

      public void listUpcomingEvents()
      Prints out all the upcoming events in the library.

    • getOfferedEvents

      Gets the offered events.
      Returns:
      offered events.

    • acceptEvent

      public boolean acceptEvent​(Event newEvent)
      Accepts an event and adds it to upcoming event list.
      Parameters:
      newEvent - is the event that will be added to the upcoming events list.
      Returns:
      true if added, false if not.

    • declineEvent

      public boolean declineEvent​(Event newEvent)
      Declines an event and remvoe it to upcoming event list.
      Parameters:
      newEvent - is the event that will be removed to the upcoming events list.
      Returns:
      true if removed, false if not.

    • endEvent

      public Event endEvent()
      Moves the first element from upcoming events to past events meaning it has ended.
      Returns:
      the removed event, null if nothing is removed

    • searchBook

      public boolean searchBook​(java.lang.String bookName, Language bookLanguage)
      Searches for a specific book in the library stock.
      Returns:
      true if the book is found in the stock, false if not.

    • searchGenre

      public void searchGenre​(BookGenre searchedGenre)
      Prints out all the books with this genre in the library.

      Parameters:
